# QML

## qml文件

import QtQuick 2.9
import QtQuick.Controls 1.2
ApplicationWindow {
    id: test
    visible: true
    width: 1000; height: 800
    Text {
        text: "hello world!";
    }
}

## 页面调用

from PyQt5.QtGui import QGuiApplication
from PyQt5 import QtQml

if __name__ == '__main__':
    path = 'qml/test.qml'  #qml文件夹下test.qml
    app = QGuiApplication([])
    engine = QtQml.QQmlApplicationEngine()
    engine.load(path)
    app.exec_()
